function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relying on wearable devices for early detection of asymptomatic and pre-symptomatic cases of COVID-19.","Impact":"Potential for false negatives, leading to undetected cases and further transmission of the virus.","Mitigation":"Supplement wearable device data with regular testing in a clinical setting to confirm COVID-19 status.","Technologies":"Integration of wearable device data with clinical testing data for a comprehensive approach to COVID-19 detection.","People":"Individuals using wearable devices as a primary means of COVID-19 monitoring.","Owner":"Health authorities and medical professionals responsible for COVID-19 testing and monitoring."}]}
